ValidationRule.description: "Follow up date and time" and "Customer address" fields are mandatory whenever the stage is set to Enquiry or Walk in or Test Drive
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( $Profile.Name="Buyer Lead CRE Agents"), ISCHANGED(StageName)|| ISCHANGED(status__c), OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Enquiry'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Walk in'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Test Drive'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Qualified'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Visit Scheduled'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Visit Rescheduled'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Test Drive Scheduled'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Test Drive Rescheduled'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Test Drive Completed'), ISPICKVAL(status__c, 'Test Drive')), OR( ISBLANK(Followup_Date_Time__c), ISBLANK(Customer_Address__c)))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Followup Date/Time & Customer Address fields are mandatory whenever the stage is set to Enquiry or Walk in or Test Drive
